ch0097_00_mai/0101_0701_02_10: I hope we can enjoy our time together...
ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_01_10: I depend on my Arcanine a lot...
ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_02_10:
Since I was little, I’ve held him while I’m going
to sleep...
ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_03_10:
He’s fluffy and warm... It’s a strange feeling,
but he makes me feel at ease.
ch0097_00_mai/0601_0701_04_10: I want to be with him forever.
ch0097_00_mai/0601_0702_01_10:
No matter how far away he is, 
he’ll always come if I call him...
ch0097_00_mai/0601_0702_02_10: My Arcanine is truly dear to me...
ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_01_10:
Weavile is a Pokémon you can find in the
Sinnoh region...
ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_02_10:
And a friend of mine...
We traveled together.
ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_03_10:
It has sharp claws, but it’s actually
quite sweet and playful. I think it’s adorable!
ch0097_00_mai/0602_0701_04_10:
If you ever come across a Weavile, it would make
me happy if you’d show it some affection, too.
ch0097_00_mai/0602_0702_01_10:
It’s nice to touch the cool body of Weavile when
it’s warm out.
ch0097_00_mai/0602_0702_02_10: But it doesn’t like it if you touch it too much...
ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_01_10:
If a Trainer doesn’t give good commands,
Pokémon get hurt in battle...
ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_02_10: That’s why I want to get better at battling.
ch0097_00_mai/0603_0701_03_10:
And it’s fun for me and my Pokémon when we
battle with you.
ch0097_00_mai/0603_0702_01_10: What I can do is just a little...
ch0097_00_mai/0603_0702_02_10: But I used that little bit of strength and got here.
ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_01_10:
I... I don’t like to talk because I’m afraid
I will accidentally hurt someone with my words.
ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_02_10:
That’s why I choose my words carefully...
But then my responses take too long.
ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_03_10: But I don’t mind talking to you like this.
ch0097_00_mai/0604_0701_04_10: I think it’s because you listen to me...
ch0097_00_mai/0604_0702_02_10: If so, I’ll share a little bit more about myself.
ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_01_10:
I think I like Pasio...
There’s so much good food and fun things to do.
ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_02_10:
Most importantly, I get to battle with
so many Trainers...
ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_03_10:
Being close to you, I feel like I can
get stronger...
ch0097_00_mai/0605_0701_04_10: I might have said some embarrassing things.
ch0097_00_mai/0605_0702_01_10: It’s truly difficult to say what you mean...
ch0097_00_mai/0605_0702_02_10:
That’s why I think it’s wonderful to be able to
be genuine with your words.
ch0097_00_mai/1701_0701_01_10: Here, this is for you. Please take it.
ch0097_00_mai/1701_0701_02_10: I thought you might like it... That’s all.
ch0097_00_mai/1701_0702_01_10: I don’t need anything in return.
ch0097_00_mai/1701_0702_02_10: It’s just a thank-you for always being there...
ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_01_10:
Arcanine is always with me when I go on
an adventure.
ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_02_10: He has taught me so much.
ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_03_10:
That’s why...I want to give him
something special...
ch0097_00_mai/2501_0701_04_10:
If I win the PML, will that be a good gift
for him?
ch0097_00_mai/2501_0702_01_10:
I’ve been with my Arcanine since he was
a Growlithe...
ch0097_00_mai/2501_0702_02_10:
He comforts me. I don’t feel lonely on adventures
if I’m with him.
ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_01_10:
I don’t like to talk, so I’ve always
kept my distance from people.
ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_02_10:
But...you’ve always been there for me,
even when I kept my distance...
ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_03_10: And I started to enjoy talking...just a little...
ch0097_00_mai/2511_0701_04_10:
I want to get better at talking because I want to
know more about you.
ch0097_00_mai/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve always chosen my words carefully so as to
not hurt anyone.
ch0097_00_mai/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder if I can stop worrying about it so much
when I get more comfortable talking...
ch0097_00_mai/3003_0701_01_10:
Hi. Is there somewhere you want to go?
Can I join you?
ch0097_00_mai/3004_0701_01_10: Just having you around makes me happy.
ch0097_00_mai/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s a bit late, but I’m happy I get
to spend more time with you.
ch0097_00_mai/3006_0701_01_10:
Nighttime can be lonely sometimes...
But when you’re around, it’s not so bad.
